data.title: Galaxis - Reise durch die Milchstraße am 14.05.2024 in Freiburg - Rausgegangen
data.meta_description: Galaxis - Reise durch die Milchstraße am 14.05.2024 in Freiburg ►  Alle Infos & Tickets auf Rausgegangen!
data.text:
Based on the latest research findings, you will experience our home galaxy more vividly than ever before. We start at our sun, look at our galaxy from the outside and plunge into the star-rich center. We will address exciting questions: How does a galaxy form and function? And where do all the

stars come from?

In collaboration with the "Collaborative Research Center 881 - The Milky Way System" at the University of Heidelberg and the international StarForge research group, the latest scientific data and simulations have been implemented for this planetarium program. This makes it possible to experience our Milky Way in three dimensions. An unprecedented experience awaits you, which will delight both amateurs and experts!

from 12 years
